title: AgriFertilize Schema
description: Schema for AgriFertilize entity. To fertilize land means to improve its quality in order to make plants grow well on it, by spreading solid animal waste or a chemical mixture on it

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity Type. It has to be AgriFertilize

enddate.description: Property. Final date of fertilizer process. This field can be empty

inidate.description: Property. The start date of the fertilization process

id.description: Property. Identifier of the measure

name.description: Property. Name assigned to the measure

prior.description: Property. Level of importance of the measure. Available values are between 0 (priority) and 10 (least priority)

type.description: Property. Type of the measure

code.description: Property. Ministry code assigned to the measure

symbol.description: Property. Symbol assigned to the measure

subtype.description: Property. Subtype details of the AgriFertilize entity

aacm.description: Property. Array of aacm objects associated with the subtype, information on amino acids of the fertilizer type

items.description: Property. Every element of the accm

type.description: Property. This field contains the type associated to the aacm, information on amino acids of the fertilizer type

id.description: Property. Identifier of aacm

value.description: Property. This field contains the value associated to the aacm

code.description: Property. Code of the aacm subtype

id.description: Property. Identifier of the aacm subtype

name.description: Property. Name of the amino acids of the fertilizer type

subtype.description: Property. Nested subtype details of aacm

id.description: Property. Identifier of the nested aacm subtype

name.description: Property. Name of the nested aacm subtype

type.description: Property. Type of the nested aacm subtype

symbol.description: Property. Symbol of the aacm subtype

type.description: Property. Type of the aacm subtype

check.description: Property. Check value associated with the subtype

comp.description: Property. Details of the company associated with the subtype

id.description: Property. Identifier of the company

name.description: Property. Name of the company that owns the fertilizer

vat.description: Property. VAT of the company that owns the fertilizer

type.description: Property. Type of the company

hecm.description: Property. Array of hecm objects associated with the subtype, information heavy metals of the fertilizer type

type.description: Property. This field contains the type associated to the hecm, information on heavy metals of the fertilizer type

id.description: Property. Identifier of hecm

value.description: Property. This field contains the value associated to the hecm

code.description: Property. Code of the hecm subtype

id.description: Property. Identifier of the hecm subtype

name.description: Property. Name of the heavy metals of the fertilizer type

subtype.description: Property. Nested subtype details of hecm

id.description: Property. Identifier of the nested hecm subtype

name.description: Property. Name of the nested hecm subtype

type.description: Property. Type of the nested hecm subtype

symbol.description: Property. Symbol of the hecm subtype

type.description: Property. Type of the hecm subtype

id.description: Property. Identifier of the subtype

macm.description: Property. Array of macm objects associated with the subtype, information on other macronutrients of the fertilizer type

items.description: Property. The individual objects inside the macm

type.description: Property. This field contains the type associated to the macm, information on other macronutrients of the fertilizer type

id.description: Property. Identifier of macm

value.description: Property. This field contains the value associated to the macm

code.description: Property. Code of the macm subtype

id.description: Property. Identifier of the macm subtype

name.description: Property. Name of the other macronutrients of the fertilizer type

subtype.description: Property. Nested subtype details of macm

id.description: Property. Identifier of the nested macm subtype

name.description: Property. Name of the nested macm subtype

type.description: Property. Type of the nested macm subtype

symbol.description: Property. Symbol of the macm subtype

type.description: Property. Type of the macm subtype

matdet.description: Property. Material fertilize detail, if any

material.description: Property. Material details associated with the subtype

id.description: Property. Identifier of the material

name.description: Property. Name of the material that uses compost or fertilizer

type.description: Property. Type of the material that uses compost or fertilizer

metadata.description: Property. Array of metadata objects associated with the subtype

items.description: Property. Every group of elements in the metadata

date.description: Property. Date associated with the metadata

type.description: Property. Type of metadata

user.description: Property. User details associated with the metadata

id.description: Property. Identifier of the user

loginname.description: Property. Login name of the user

name.description: Property. Name of the user in the system

vat.description: Property. VAT (identification number) of the user

type.description: Property. Type of the user

micm.description: Property. Array of micm objects associated with the subtype, information on micronutrients of the type of fertilizer

items.description: Property. Every element of te micm

type.description: Property. This field contains the type associated to the micm, information on micronutrients of the type of fertilizer

id.description: Property. Identifier of micm

value.description: Property. This field contains the value associated to the micm

code.description: Property. Code of the micm subtype

id.description: Property. Identifier of the micm subtype

name.description: Property. Name of the micronutrients of the type of fertilizer

subtype.description: Property. Nested subtype details of micm

id.description: Property. Identifier of the nested micm subtype

name.description: Property. Name of the nested micm subtype

type.description: Property. Type of the nested micm subtype

symbol.description: Property. Symbol of the micm subtype

type.description: Property. Type of the micm subtype

mmcm.description: Property. Array of mmcm objects associated with the subtype

items.description: Property. Every element in the mmdm array

type.description: Property. This field contains the type associated to the mmcm, information on the main macronutrients of the fertilizer type

id.description: Property. Identifier of mmcm

value.description: Property. This field contains the value associated to the mmcm

code.description: Property. Code of the mmcm subtype

id.description: Property. Identifier of the mmcm subtype

name.description: Property. Name of the main macronutrient of the fertilizer type

subtype.description: Property. Nested subtype details of mmcm

id.description: Property. Identifier of the nested mmcm subtype

name.description: Property. Name of the nested mmcm subtype

type.description: Property. Type of the nested mmcm subtype

symbol.description: Property. Symbol of the mmcm subtype

type.description: Property. Type of the mmcm subtype

name.description: Property. Name of the type of fertilizer used and associated with the fertilization code

notes.description: Property. Notes associated with the subtype

target.description: Property. Target details for the AgriFertilize entity

typsoil.description: Property. Type of soil associated with the AgriFertilize entity

bill.description: Property. Invoice or delivery note number

detail.description: Property. User notes on administered fertilizer

idcp.description: Property.  IDs of the CropSigpac on which the fertilizer is applied in the campaign

machine.description: Property. Information on the machinery assigned to the application of the fertilizer as well as information on its hygiene

items.description: Property. Every element in the array of machines used

type.description: Property. This field contains the type of machine

id.description: Property. Identifier unique of the machine

product.description: Property. This field contains the value associated to the product that the machine applies

detail.description: Property. This field contains the value associated to the machine

idmachine.description: Property. This field contains the value associated to the internal id

maf.description: Property. Information on fertilizer application methods

id.description: Property. Identifier of fertilizer application mode

name.description: Property. Name of fertilizer application mode

type.description: Property. Type of fertilizer application mode

msoup.description: Property. Information on the measurement used for the final amount of broth administered

id.description: Property. Identifier of the msoup

name.description: Property. Name of the measure used for the final amount of broth administered

prior.description: Property. Prior details of the measure used for the final amount of broth administered

type.description: Property. Type of the measure used for the final amount of broth administered

code.description: Property. Code of the measure used for the final amount of broth administered

symbol.description: Property. Symbol of the measure used for the final amount of broth administered

mud.description: Property. Indicates whether sewage sludge application document has been used or not

plan.description: Property. Information about the subscriber plans that are part of the campaign

r10.description: Property. Waste authorisation number R10. The treatment of soil by applying waste to the land is considered a recovery operation coded as R1001. Residues must be applied to agricultural soils exclusively for the purpose of producing a benefit to agriculture or an ecological improvement of the same

taf.description: Property. Information on types of fertilizer application

id.description: Property. Identifier of the TAF

name.description: Property. Name of the types of fertilizer application

type.description: Property. Type of the types of fertilizer application

tmi.description: Property. Information on the types of inhibitory molecule

id.description: Property. Identifier of the types of inhibitory molecule

name.description: Property. Name of the types of inhibitory molecule

type.description: Property. Type of the types of inhibitory molecule
